purpleculture_pinyin:
wèi
variant of 為 |为 , because of; for; to
вариант 為 | 为, из-за; за; к

wéi
variant of 為 |为 ; as (i.e. in the capacity of); to take sth as; to act as; to serve as; to behave as; to become; to be; to do
вариант 為 | 为; как (т.е. в качестве); принять что-то как; действовать как; служить; вести себя как; стать; быть; сделать
rtega_mnemonic:
為為RS
为为		爲𢏽do, handle, govern, act, be
  • RS. and lit. hand ⺤ feeding an elephant 為: → 爲 → 為 → 为
象
purpleculture_examples:
爲什麽 [ wéi shén me ]: on account of sth
爲什麽骄傲 [ wéi shén me jiāo ào ]: proud of sth
origin_of_ch_char_book: (爲, 为, wei, support; do) shows that elephants were very well-cared for. This character means “to support” or “for someone”. The top part is a hand , and the bottom part is an elephant (象, xiang=hsiang). In other words, someone is doing something for the elephant such as giving it food or decorating it.

爲

    Example Words:
    爲什麽 [ wéi shén me ]: on account of sth
    爲什麽骄傲 [ wéi shén me jiāo ào ]: proud of sth
    More: 爲* | *爲 | *爲*

origin_of_ch_char_book: (爲, 为, wei, support; do) shows that elephants were very well-cared for. This character means “to support” or “for someone”. The top part is a hand , and the bottom part is an elephant (象, xiang=hsiang). In other words, someone is doing something for the elephant such as giving it food or decorating it.

爲字的基本解释

爲
wéi

爲
wèi
均见“为”。

爲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wéi］
［《廣韻》薳支切，平支，云。］
亦作“為1”。“为1”的繁体字。
(1)做；干。
(2)特指服劳役之事。
(3)造作；制作。
(4)谓制定，订立。
(5)治理。
(6)做出；装出。
(7)举行；施行。
(8)陈设；设置。
(9)医治。
(10)学习；研究。
(11)撰写。
(12)指绘画；雕刻。
(13)吟唱；演奏。
(14)栽种，种植。
(15)精选；选择。
(16)穿，着。
(17)求取。
(18)赐与；给与。
(19)有。
(20)充当；担任。
(21)当作。
(22)用；使用。
(23)变成。
(24)长成；成熟；成长。
(25)算是；算作。
(26)是。
(27)如同；好像。
(28)归于；属于。
(29)使；致使。
(30)缘故。
(31)在比较句中作谓语动词。含有“最”、“更”的意思。后面形容词多为单音节。
(32)猴子。
(33)副词。犹将。

爲字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【爪字部】　爲； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页689第13
〔古文〕??【唐韻】薳支切【集韻】于嬀切，?音潙。【說文】母猴也。其爲禽好爪。爪母猴象也。下腹爲母猴形。王育曰：爪象形也。　又【爾雅·釋言】作，造，爲也。【書·益稷】予欲宣力四方汝爲。【洪範】有猷有爲有守。　又治也。【晉語】疾不可爲也。【註】爲，治也。　又使也。【魯語】其爲後世昭前之令聞也。【註】爲，猶使也。　又語詞。【前漢·武帝紀】何但亡匿幕北寒苦之地爲。　又姓。【廣韻】風俗通云：漢有南郡太守爲昆。【韻會】魯昭公子公爲之後。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?于僞切，音䧦。【廣韻】助也。【增韻】所以也，緣也，被也，護也，與也。【書·咸有一德】臣爲上爲德，爲下爲民。【釋文】爲上爲下之爲，于僞反。徐云：四爲字皆于僞反。又【多士】惟我下民秉爲。【詩·大雅】福祿來爲。【箋】爲，猶助也。【釋文】于僞反，協句如字。　又叶吾何切，音莪。【詩·王風】有兔爰爰，雉離于羅。我生之初，尙無爲。我生之後，逢此百罹，尙寐無吪。

for
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wéi］
["Guangyun" Cobra branch cut, flat branch, cloud. ]
Also called "为1". Traditional characters for "为1".
(1) Do; do.
(2) Specifically refers to the service of labor.
(3) Fabrication; production.
(4) It means to make and make.
(5) Governance.
(6) Make; pretend.
(7) Held; implemented.
(8) Furnishings; setting.
(9) Healing.
(10) Study; research.
(11) Compose.
(12) Refers to painting; carving.
(13) Chanting; playing.
(14) Planting, planting.
(15) Selection; selection.
(16) Wear and wear.
(17) Seek.
(18) Give; give.
(19) Yes.
(20) To act as; to act as.
(21) As.
(22) Use; use.
(23) Become.
(24) Grow; mature; grow.
(25) counted as; counted as.
(26) Yes.
(27) As; as if.
(28) Be attributed to; belong to.
(29) To cause; to cause.
(30) Sake.
(31) Use as a predicate verb in comparative sentences. Contains the meaning of "most" and "more". The following adjectives are mostly monosyllable.
(32) Monkey.
(33) Adverbs. You will.

[Si Collection] [Claw Character Department] 　为; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 689 13
〔古文〕??【Tang Yun】薳zhizhiqi [Jiyun] Yu Zhuoqie, 雲音沩. [Said the text] The mother monkey too. It is a good claw for poultry. The claw female monkey is also like. The lower abdomen is in the shape of a female monkey. Wang Yu said: The claw pictogram is also.　[Erya·Explanation] to make, make, for also. 【Book·Yiji】I want to express power in all directions. [Hong Fan] You have something to do and defend.　 You Zhiya. [Jin dialect] Illness can't be done. 【Note】For, Zhiye.　 Make it again. [Lu language] It is the lingwen of the later generations before Zhaoqian. [Note] Yes, it is still so.　 Another language. [Pre-Han·Wu Emperor Ji] What a place of horror in the north.　Another last name. [Guangyun] The customs are clear: Han has the prefect of Nanjun as Kun. [Rhyme Club] The son of Lu Zhao is the queen.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yu Pseudo-cut, Yin 䧦. [Guang Yun] Help also. [Zeng Yun] So Ye, Yuan Ye, Bei Ye, Protect Ye, and Ye. [Book·Xianyue has a virtue] The minister is virtue for the superior and the people for the down. 【Explanation】It means that the top is the bottom, which is opposite to the pseudo. Xu Yun: The four characters are all pseudo-antis. And [toast] But I go down to the people. 【Poetry·Daya】Fu Lu is here. 【Jan】Yes, it's still helpful. 【Explanation】In the pseudo-inverse, co-sentences are like words.　Ye Wu He cut again, Yin E. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】There are rabbits and pheasants away from Luo. At the beginning of my life, I didn't know anything about doing nothing. After I was born, I suffered a hundred deaths from this point of view.
